ActorTalk: [PlayerName], you've been working hard lately. Got any plans for this vacation?
The Commercial District was just renovated. There should be a lot of new places to check out. Want to go explore together?
Liv mentioned she's prepared a surprise for you, but she's keeping it a secret for now. She asked us to wait for her message.
As part of the renovations, a bunch of terminal beacons were installed across the Commercial District. How about we go log their data, Commandant?
Once we're done, Liv should be ready to contact us.
Then I'll stay with you the whole time, Commandant.
If you're looking to relax, I know a few nice spots we could visit.
Spending time with you is good enough for me.
I'd like to walk around Babylonia more.
